DOC.brief_summary: The current study was designed to determine whether the HLA-DRB1, DQA1, DQB1 alleles are associated with the risk and the pattern of valve damage of RHD.
DOC.brief_title: DNA Typing of HLA-DR/DQ Alleles in Taiwan Chinese With Rheumatic Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: 1.Patients with Rheumatic mitral stenosis 2.Chinese Han ethnicity
DOC.keyword: Rheumatic heart disease, HLA, Genetics, Taiwan
